column5: Our MSc Digital Innovation Management is aimed at providing students with a unique opportunity to combine knowledge of digital innovation with management insights and strategies, enabling you to stay ahead of one the fastest evolving trends in the world.You will be equipped with highly sought-after skills of entrepreneurship and digital technologies in setting up and managing technology based or other businesses and enterprises.
column7: For more information, please visit the programme page on our website.
column9: Full-time: 1 year, Part-time: up to 4 years
